name: common_sense
summary: Generates contextually appropriate responses to user queries by leveraging a pre-trained AI language model.
description: This function employs a sophisticated language model to interpret and respond to user requests, useful in a wide variety of natural language understanding tasks. These tasks may include but are not limited to answering questions, generating text, summarizing content, and more.

args.name: request
args.description: The user's request as a string, which should be 500 characters or fewer.
args.example_value: What is the capital of France?

return_value.description: A human-like response generated by the AI model based on the given request. The nature and complexity of this response can vary significantly, ranging from simple factual answers to more nuanced, detailed textual content.
